summary:
Idea: you aren’t feeling too great and Steve doesn’t make it any better
Paring: Steve Rogers x Reader 
Word count:...
body:
Too Far Part 2

 Idea: you aren’t feeling too great and Steve doesn’t make it any better

Paring: Steve Rogers x Reader 

Word count: 556

Genre/Warnings: fluff, some angst?, hospital scene, mild swearing.

A/N: Wow! actually posting something lmao. This is just the second part of my first imagine find that here

PART 1

(gif from Pinterest again) 

 “Y/N I-I’m sorry, I-I di-did this, I pushed yo-you to hard…” Steve’s voice could be heard around you, along with the dull beep of a machine. You roughly knew where you were. A hospital. Just what you needed, mentally rolling your eyes. Taking in a deep breath, you felt a hand clasped around yours, most likely Steve’s. Opening your eyes slowly trying to adjust to the sudden change in brightness, looking down at Steve he was to put it politely. A mess. You were a bit pissed from the last heated conversation if you could call it that, but there was not really a point in dwelling on it as you knew Steve would not forget this. Most likely to be saying sorry for the rest of his life. Smiling at the thought, you grasped his hand notifying him of your wake.

“Y/N?…” Steve questioned worriedly.

“What did I miss?” you said tiredly, making Steve smile at your effort to make light of this situation.

“Not a lot. I-I don’t know where to start, God I’m such an idiot-” you held up your hand silencing Steve. 

“Piss off.” Steve rose his eyebrow at your language. 

“Y/N the doctor said you couldn’t have slept in at least 3 days, let alone the fact that you were severely dehydrated.” He spoke caringly towards you.

“Was that your fault? No, I’m the one that decided that work was more important, don’t you dare blame yourself,” you warned him. 

“But I made you work non-stop. Thinking you were messing about.” Steve countered.

“Listen let's not argue, It was my fault and also yours, maybe 80 per cent your fault…” you said laughing towards Steve, who couldn’t help but smile at you. 

“You scared me Y/N… I-I really didn’t know what to do…” He said quietly towards you.

“Hey, it’s alright see I’m fine, good as new,” you said trying to cheer up the situation.

“It could’ve been worse…I-” You cupped Steves face into your hands, staring right into his eyes. 

“I’m here it wasn't that bad, with the job we do we can’t afford to be worrying if it could’ve been worse. We are both here and that’s all that matters.” You weren't a big crier but at this moment a few tears escaped down your face. Feeling Steve’s thumb swipe under your eye, letting out a small laugh smiling up at Steve, both of you leaning in closer to one another.

Your lips touched slowly, a sweet loving kiss, warm and gentle matching his personality. 

“Well, well what do we have here?” The two of you broke off your loving moment to see your rather annoying teammates all crowding around the door. You saw Bucky hand Sam some cash, probably some bet they had on they always do.

“Nice to see your okay Y/N, glad that Steve could aid you on your recovery,” Tony winked at you. 

“Looks like we should leave the two lovebirds alone,” Sam spoke up from the back, only to receive a pat on the back from Bucky who was laughing. The team said their goodbyes and left you and Steve alone again.

Looking at the beautifully annoying man on your left, the two of you burst out laughing. Spending the rest of the day watching crappy re-runs and eating junk in each other’s arms.

a/n: that was cute. Any requests please message, my inbox is open! xx

Tags: @bluepineforests @coralmakercollectorsworld

@nothernlights19

I post it and if you should find a picture that you made please send me a message and I'll give you credits. I don't want to steal your pictures or offend you. I just post stuff I like and found somewhere on the internet

summary: When I went to the cinema this year to watch infinity war, there was this group of boys who were really annoying and talking...
body:
When I went to the cinema this year to watch infinity war, there was this group of boys who were really annoying and talking during the movie. After the post credit scene which was introducing Captain Marvel but without showing her, I overheard this one boy of them bragging to his friends that Captain Marvel is this cool and tough „guy“ who can basically do anything. His friends were really impressed that he knew about „him“. So naturally when I passed them when walking out the cinema I said „By the way, Captain Marvel is a woman“

The reaction was priceless

blog.name: fandomfitmom
blog.title: Concentrate On The Results
blog.description: A blog dedicated to health, wellness, fitness and finding ourselves in our best shape for A4! 🖤

summary: Resistance bands are new for me so I went to google for help with this workout. Do each exercise 12-15 reps, for 3 sets. Rest...
body:
Resistance bands are new for me so I went to google for help with this workout. Do each exercise 12-15 reps, for 3 sets. Rest two minutes in between sets.

Seated Row

Sit on a bench and secure the middle of the band to a stationary object in front of you. Grasp the end of the band with your elbows extended in front and pull the bands toward your lower ribs, bending your elbows. Slowly return.

Reverse Fly

Secure the middle of the band to a stationary object at shoulder height. Face the attachment point. Using a staggered step with one leg slightly in front of the other, grasp the ends of the band with your elbows straight. Keep your elbows straight and pull the ends of the band outward. Slowly return.

Lat Pull-Down

Secure the middle of the band to a stationary object above shoulder height. Face the attachment point. Using a staggered step with one leg slightly in front of the other, grasp the ends of the band above shoulder height with your elbows extended in front. Bend your elbows and bring your hands to your chest, pulling the bands down and back. Slowly return.

Shrug

Stand on the middle of a long band or tubing with both feet. Grasp the ends of the band at hip height. Keep your elbows straight and shrug your shoulders. Slowly return.

Bent Over Row

Use a staggered step with one leg in front of the other. Stand on the middle of the band or tubing with your front foot. Bend forward at the hips, keeping your back straight. Grasp the end of the band with your elbow straight. Pull one end of the band upward by bending the elbows, bringing your hand to your trunk. Slowly return.

Linton External Rotation

Begin by kneeling with the band or tubing secured under one hand and maintaining tension with the other hand, forearm on your abdomen. Start the exercise by externally rotating the shoulder, then abduct and extend the arm simultaneously, pointing your thumb toward the ceiling. Hold; then slowly return, first bringing your elbow into your side.

Bilateral Extension with Retraction

Securely attach the middle of the band to a sturdy object in front of you. Grasp the ends of the band at hip height with your elbows straight and palms forward. Extend your arms backward and pinch your shoulder blades together against the band. Slowly return.

High Row

Secure the middle of the band to a stationary object in front of you at shoulder height. Grasp the ends of the band with your elbows extended and pull the bands toward your chest, bending your elbows. Slowly return.

Full Workout Here–

https://www.fitsimplify.com/resistance-band-chest-back-training-guide/


Tag List— @buckysbrat @ravensonata @thorohdamnson @princess-evans-addict @badassbaker @mittenskittie @ishipmybed @qnzdiamond104 @stanclub @ruinerofcheese @tropicalcap @aglarelen @anon-pancake @redqueen1221

blog.description: Tribute blog to Marvel's (Kree) Captains Marvel: Mar-Vell, Genis-Vell, Carol Danvers, Phyla-Vell, Noh-Varr and associates (so, also Guardians of the Galaxy, Rick Jones, Thanos, Adam Warlock, Quasar, The Avengers and Cosmic Stuff in general, Hulkling and the Young Avengers, etc).

blog.name: electricnik
blog.title: Eclectic
blog.description:
Popular culture, wildlife, history, anything that floats my boat and the occasional rant.
I used to edit an AC/DC fanzine, am an artist, photographer and occasional writer. Current occupation, working with tourists and giving talks about the Titanic in Southampton.

summary: A new cute and scary addition to the marvel characters, Scary Cat. This was aimed at kids but I thought it was quite funny and...
caption: A new cute and scary addition to the marvel characters, Scary Cat. This was aimed at kids but I thought it was quite funny and bought it. The cat appears throughout the comic scaring various characters, like Tony here.
